body:
Add a "mute shellmap" option.

I like to see the shellmap, but hate having to hear it.

Crashes for me when loading up the Red Alert music box after mute, unmute, mute in settings:

```

AL lib: (EE) alc_cleanup: 1 device not closed
```

Fixed the crashes in Extras -> Music and now accounts for missing music.
Remnants of a refactor. Rebased and updated.

I'm not really fond of the UI for this one. I'm all for a mute option of some description, don't get me wrong, but hiding it away in Settings/Audio is just way too inaccessible, and also kinda redundant since you can just change the volume sliders as well if you're there already. I don't have a really convincing suggestion for an alternative to make, unfortunately. Maybe a hotkey would work better.
FWIW I think having the checkbox on its own, even without a hotkey, is still useful on its own merit of not losing your slider settings.

Added and assigned mute hotkey to 'M'. 

Game debug also displays a message on mute / unmute so players don't get confused if accidentally pressed.
Looks good. The hotkey doesn't work in the main menu where it probably would be the most useful, but we don't have a non-hacky way to make it work there, so :+1:
